name: Karjala
storyline:
Remember your feelings when you first touched your parent's videotape, the 4:3 picture format, the noise on the screen and something very interesting that lies ahead.

But here the story is about something else: a creepy experiment leads a hapless soldier to Backrooms, where he has to go through several levels, meet dangerous creatures and try to get back.

Explore, hide, listen to every suspicious sound, especially footsteps.... Most importantly, survive.
summary: VHS bodycam horror in the atmosphere of Soviet Backrooms. Karelia is a country of rivers, forests and lakes, where the modern world comes in contact with superstitions and ancient rituals. Soldier Solnyshkov agrees to take part in a strange experiment of his command.
